item.title: APISIX Service Mesh
item.description: Apache APISIX is generally used to manage north-south traffic in Kubernetes and often sits at the edge of a cluster. With Amesh, APISIX is now a service mesh.

item.title: Meshery, the Service Mesh Manager
item.description: Meshery is an open source service mesh management plane that enables the adoption, operation, and management of any service mesh and their workloads.
